backend/main.mo: Defines resident-related types and comparison utilities, includes authorization and storage mixins, and exposes no new backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to involved files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries of numerous frontend source files describing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Provides the main production deployment checklist covering manual, scripted, and clean-rebuild deployment workflows.
frontend/deployment_logs/.gitkeep: Placeholder file describing the purpose of the deployment logs directory and the types of log and metadata files generated by deployment scripts.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Historical deployment guide specific to Version 89 with publish-only steps and smoke-test summary.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme design tokens and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the main TypeScript frontend module.
frontend/scripts/clean_redeploy_producti: Script performing a clean rebuild by removing caches and prior builds, injecting metadata, and redeploying to the IC with detailed logging.
frontend/scripts/deploy_version_89_publi: Historical script for retrying version 89 publish-only deployments, building and deploying the frontend and saving canister IDs.
frontend/scripts/post_deploy_smoke_test_: Interactive script guiding operators through smoke tests and validating deployment artifacts and canister IDs.
frontend/scripts/redeploy_production.sh: Script rebuilding the frontend with injected metadata, deploying to the IC, and recording canister IDs and repo state.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_VERSION_89.md: Detailed smoke-test checklist for validating Version 89 behavior after deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the root React app with authentication, backend actor initialization, startup health checks, and routing logic. Manages slow-start detection, failure modes, and conditional rendering for login, dashboard, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Provides a dialog form for adding ADL records for a resident, handling validation, state management, and mutation submission. Includes activity, assistance level, date, and notes fields.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Implements a dialog to record daily vitals for a resident, converting date/time to nanoseconds and submitting vitals via mutation. Handles temperature unit conversion, validation, and form state reset.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Creates a form dialog for logging medication administration records, selecting active medications and submitting administration details. Validates selections, converts date/time, and posts data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Provides a dialog for adding a new medication to a resident, collecting dosage, route, times, physician, and notes. Parses administration times, links prescribing physicians, and submits via mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Dialog component for creating a new resident with fields for personal info, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and responsible persons.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Form dialog to record a resident's weight entry including date, value, unit, and notes.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the application's logo with size and mode options, including a fallback if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsIndic: Displays frontend build metadata, environment, and backend canister ID with warnings for missing info.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog for editing an existing medication's details such as dosage, route, administration times, and prescribing physician.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Dialog for updating a resident’s profile including personal info, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, responsible persons, and medications.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component for entering and saving a user's name and employee ID using a startup-safe profile save mutation.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Displays a detailed startup error screen with diagnostics, error details, and retry/logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines profile and data-related queries and mutations using actors, including startup-safe variants with timeouts and error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Builds a resilient backend actor with timeouts and optional admin initialization, exposing status and retry controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme color variables, dialog overrides, and detailed print styles.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides timeout handling, canister error detection, and normalization utilities for backend connection errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds safe asset URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL, normalizing slashes and paths.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Retrieves build metadata and environment info and generates build identifiers with fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Converts dates to and from nanoseconds and formats or derives age without timezone issues.
frontend/src/lib/residentEnumMapping.ts: Maps string values to backend RoomType and ResidentStatus enums and vice versa.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Extracts backend diagnostic info and performs a timeout-protected health check using an anonymous actor.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines standardized timeout constants for startup, health checks, and resident operations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing residents, sorting/filtering, and actions like discharge, archive, and delete using multiple query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen that authenticates users via Internet Identity with a branded UI card.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Resident profile page that fetches detailed data, manages dialogs for editing and adding records, and handles medication and vitals updates.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash‑routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, keyframes, and container settings for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, existing features, and rollback requirements for Version 85 deployment.
